$description:
| What does this do? | Ensures Microsoft 365 audit log search is enabled. |
| Why should you use this? | Records user and admin activity within the organization, retaining it for a minimum of 90 days. |
| What is the end-user impact? | None. |
| Learn more | [Audit log](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/purview/audit-log-enable-disable?view=o365-worldwide&tabs=microsoft-purview-portal) |
